oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sophia Chester Carter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Copy print of a charcoal drawing portrait of Sophia Chester Carter (1820-1940).

Sophia Chester Carter was born in 1820 on the Little Tennessee River and died on December 2, 1940 in Kerrville, Tennessee. She lived to be 120 years old and is buried in Arlington, Tennessee in the Ludicia Cemetery. She was married to Henry Carter Sr. She is the great-great-great grandmother of the donor.
